body:
Note that if we merge this in, tests will break for two reasons:
- The tests in master no longer work with Ubuntu 14.04. We have to restore the python 3.5 stuff.
- The tests are known to crash on Ubuntu 14.04 unless we install numpy from scratch. We have to update that too.

Delete for now?
body_html:
Note that if we merge this in, tests will break for two reasons:

  • The tests in master no longer work with Ubuntu 14.04. We have to restore the python 3.5 stuff.
  • The tests are known to crash on Ubuntu 14.04 unless we install numpy from scratch. We have to update that too.

Delete for now?
body_text:
Note that if we merge this in, tests will break for two reasons:

The tests in master no longer work with Ubuntu 14.04. We have to restore the python 3.5 stuff.
The tests are known to crash on Ubuntu 14.04 unless we install numpy from scratch. We have to update that too.

Delete for now?
